revision.text: {{Wired embedded system |brand=Nuvoton |model=NK-Tomato |revision=V1.1 |is_manuf=Yes |price=37 |est_release_date=09/2016 |type=single-board computer, IoT |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=USB Female Mini-B |cpu1_brand=Nuvoton |cpu1_model=NUC976;NUC976DK62Y; |cpu1_cspeed=300 |cpu2_brand=Nuvoton |cpu2_model=NUC122;NUC122ZD2; |cpu2_cspeed=60 |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q16JVSIQ |fla2=64 KiB |fla2_brand=Nuvoton |fla2_model=NUC122 |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Nuvoton |ram1_model=NUC976 |ram2=8 KiB |ram2_brand=Nuvoton |ram2_model=NUC122 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, USB Female Mini-B,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=IC+ |eth_chip2_model=IP101GR |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=24-bit Stereo Audio Codec w/ Speaker Driver;Nuvoton;NAU8822L;;1;,,, 1A Low-Dropout Voltage Regulator;Advanced Monolithic Systems;AMS1117;;2;,,, 500mA Linear Regulator;Nuvoton;NCT3705U;;1;,,, Charger Protection IC;Anpec;APL3211A;;1;,,, |flags=Micro SD Card slots, Arduino expansion, microphone, Audio out (3.5 mm), GPIO |stock_boot=U-Boot;2013.04; |stock_os=Linux;3.10.101; }} {{TagLine|NuMaker Tomato (IoT Gateway)}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.nuvoton.com/products/iot-solution/iot-platform/numaker-tomato/}} {{See also|List of Single-board computers}} ===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Nuvoton]] [https://www.nuvoton.com/products/microprocessors/arm9-mpus/nuc970-industrial-control-series/nuc976dk61y/ NU976] ARM926EJ-S @300MHz *Storage: 2MB SPI flash + Micro SD (TF) slot *RAM: Built-in 64MB DDR2 *USB: 1x USB 2.0 Type A, 1x USB 2.0 Mini-B *Network: 1x Fast Ethernet *Power Source: USB Female Mini-B ==Images== ---- __NOTOC__
